welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Flowery Branch, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport offers domestic flights to various destinations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Winder Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is primarily used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport serves domestic flights to and from various cities in the United States.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights, as well as flight training and aircraft maintenance services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
